features: Efficient Particle Filtration: AROEVE air purifier utilizes a HEPA filter that can effectively filter out particles such as smoke, pollen, dander, hair, and more, potentially improving air quality and promoting better health and well-being for you.

High Circulation Rate: With dual-channel and 360-degree air inlets technology, AROEVE air purifier refreshes the air per hour in rooms up to 215 ft² / 20 m², covering every corner of the room to promote better health for you.

Low Decibel Operation: AROEVE air purifier operates quietly, especially when the sleep mode is activated, which reduces the fan speed to the lowest setting, effectively eliminating any noticeable sound. The filtered air noise is as low as 22 dB, making it ideal for creating a peaceful and relaxing indoor environment while still providing effective purification.

Enjoy Fragrant Air: It features an aroma pad located below the air outlet that allows you to add 4-5 drops of your favorite essential oil (not included). As the purifier circulates fresh air, the fragrance spreads throughout the room, creating a pleasant and healthy environment for you and your family to enjoy.

Notice: To ensure the health and safety of you and your family, our AROEVE air purifiers are equipped with a 2000-hour cartridge replacement reminder. Once the purifier has been in use for more than 2000 hours, a red indicator light will turn on to remind you to replace the filter cartridge. For optimal performance, we recommend replacing the filter cartridge once every 3-6 months. (Note: The voltage of the air purifier is 120V and is suitable for use only in the United States.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This works great!
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for an air humidifier that is relatively small and is not way too expensive, this is the one for you! I was looking for one because I have two cats and a litter box, and the fumes from litter boxes are not good for your health. I did not want a huge one, because I have a small living space, and this is perfect. I have had it for a few weeks, and I can tell there is a difference in the air quality! Sometimes I would walk in and I feel like it would smell musty, but since having it I have not smelled that at all! I also used to use a small diffuser for essential oils, but this purifier has a place where you can put essential oils and I have not used my diffuser since. This air purifier is amazing! I would recommend it to anyone with a litter box or just anyone wanting an air humidifier. The only reason I would not recommend it is if you are wanting it to cover a whole house. It works perfect for the camper I live in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this air purifier. It's very powerful on the high seeing but not loud. The look is sleek and the lighting mode is perfect for a night light, you can turn on one light or both lights and they are nice looking. The fragrance spot is handy as well. I've not ventured to get scents to test out so I'm not sure how powerful the scent release is. I had a left over pine scent oil that I put in it but it's not much of a scent. The size had me worried when I unboxed it but the power is really impressive so I don't regret this purchase at all. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great for small rooms
reviews.reviewText: To make a long story short, I have new neighbors who are avid Mary Jane smokers, and my townhouse always ends up smelling like reefer when they light up. I bought this to help with the stench, and it works pretty well for small rooms…like my bathroom, where the scent tends to be really strong due to the ventilation system in the building. I found that it didn’t work as well as I’d hoped in my bedroom, which is about 150 square feet. Since it claims to filter up to 215 square feet, I thought I would be good to go. I decided to keep it anyway and just use it in the bathroom, but I did end up ordering a larger, more powerful unit for my bedroom. If all you’re looking for is mild scent removal and decent air filtration, this one might be just the thing for you, but I don’t think it’s powerful enough to really filter the air in a 200 square foot (or larger) space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I definitely noticed a change in my bedroom. It’s not nearly as stuff with my poor airflow and a medium sized dog. It’s also a below average sized bedroom, but this thing works wonders. A nice little red light comes on when the filter needs changing and you just pop a new one in. It’s crazy the amount of dander and dust this thing sucks up. There is a sleep mode and it’s insanely quiet but I actually run it on mode 2 nonstop and have no issues sleeping, it’s easy to get used to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is excellent. I live in a studio apt in a large building. Lots of cooking smells come through my vents and smoke! I couldn't wait to plug it in and see how it worked. Within 40 minutes my apt was so fresh and clean NO odors. I'm sold. I've mentioned this one to several neighbors. The price is excellent too. Comes with extra filter. The size is perfect for top of a side table and it's whisper quiet. Even on the highest setting I now sleep well without odors. Love this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my bedroom
reviews.reviewText: This unit takes up little space but does a great job! I like that it has a sleep mode which is very quiet because the fan is pretty loud otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because we use the bigger version at my workplace. This filter is amazing and works as well as I expected. It's a tad noisier that I would like but does not keep me awake. The blue light feature is great if you like a "night light"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Make sure to order the right size!
reviews.reviewText: The air purifier arrived on time & in good condition. It was very easy to unpackage & I made sure to take the plastic off of the filter. This works great for my room, until someone opens the door. Then it's like the unit has to start all over again. So I was hoping when I bought this that it would solve my problem. What I didn't realize is that I need to buy I guess 2 or 3 bigger units, so the whole house's air can be purified to where when I open my door the one I have will work. Then I can't help but wonder what will happen when one of the doors to the outside are opened. We have no pets, so that's not a problem, the only one I see is dust. I'm hoping I can talk to someone about how many units I would need to solve this problem. A whole house purifier on our furnace is not an option. So I try now to keep my door closed as much as possible. The problem is not with the unit. It works great & I really like how easy it is to use.
This hepa filter with an essential oil dropper area is exactly what I neede - the sleep mode is super quiet!

Amazing product. I use it for my bedroom and sometimes put it in my living room. It's obviously not meant for larger rooms above 200 square feet, so if you need to purify larger spaces consider getting two or search for larger units. I noticed a huge change in the air quality after a couple of hours.

Pour les fumeur jai limpression qui faudra changer de filtre souvent, ses bon pour une petite piece parfait pour la chambre a coucher. Je Vais asseyer une autre marque pour comparer mais qualitee/prix je donne un8 sur 10. Est arriver 2 jours de retard
Bought for our Den. Very small and quite in sleep mode. Noticed a difference in air quality. Bought another for our bedroom. Have not been disappointed.
This is a great machine, super quiet too. Compact also.
